channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 4, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-march-4-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Bounty of the Week_ * _Delta Green_ * _Devil's Dreams_ * _Fate of the Faerie Queen_ * _Gun & Slinger_ * _Icebox_ * _Old School Essentials_ * _The Twilight Throne and the Houses of Ruin_ * _Uncharted Worlds 2E_ * _Vow of the Knight-Aspirants_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

item.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - March 4, 2022
item.dc:creator: @flatvurm
item.description:
@flatvurm wrote:

Greetings, all! This week’s Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we’ve got sessions of these great games:

  • Bounty of the Week
  • Delta Green
  • Devil’s Dreams
  • Fate of the Faerie Queen
  • Gun & Slinger
  • Icebox
  • Old School Essentials

  • Vow of the Knight-Aspirants

Thanks go out to all this week’s facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the Gauntlet Calendar category on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the Gauntlet Calendar to play!
